overview:
Brandi Narvaez, MBA, PMP, brings more than 17 years of healthcare experience in project management, implementation services, and customer support. With an in-depth understanding of the clinical workflows and needs of care providers, Brandi focuses on strategically aligning Aventura solutions with clinical workflows and processes to consistently meet customer business goals and objectives.

Prior to joining Aventura, Narvaez was CEO of a professional services organization that specialized in identity and access solutions. Prior to that, Brandi worked at Sentillion, managing implementations for large-scale healthcare companies and started her career in the health insurance industry with Delta Dental.
